content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron Plate Production Area at position(-11.5, 19.5)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting iron ore into iron plates:
- First stone furnace at position(-11.0, 20.0)
- Second stone furnace at position(-9.0, 20.0)
Both furnaces are operational and processing iron ore into iron plates, positioned near the iron ore source.

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when attempting to craft items requiring assembly machines
- Iron gear wheels cannot be crafted by hand as they require assembly machines
- Before attempting to craft items like iron gear wheels, ensure you:
  1. Have the required assembly machine built
  2. Have the necessary raw materials (iron plates) available
  3. Use the assembly machine for crafting instead of trying to craft manually

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Verify that you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it
- Craft or obtain the entity first before trying to place it

### Errors when crafting technology-locked items
- Assembling machines require the "Automation" technology to be researched before they can be crafted
- Check technology prerequisites before attempting to craft advanced items
- Research required technologies first, then proceed with crafting
